def_en: You use anyone or anybody in statements with negative meaning to indicate in a general way that nobody is present or involved in an action.

def_cn: （用于疑问句或条件从句）任何人
def_en: You use anyone or anybody in questions and conditional clauses to ask or talk about whether someone is present or doing something.

def_cn: （用于描述所谈论的人的词语前）…人
def_en: You use anyone or anybody before words which indicate the kind of person you are talking about.

def_cn: （用于强调）任何人，随便哪个人
def_en: You use anyone or anybody to refer to a person when you are emphasizing that it could be any person out of a very large number of people.

def_cn: 重要人物;有影响的人物
def_en: You use anyone who is anyone and anybody who is anybody to refer to people who are important or influential.
